ygData.subject: Re: Pottery
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, but who else is going to buy most of that junk ??  I mean really, how many of you would PAY to have a rusty weapon sharpened for you? DUH!  They
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Aaron Braunstein <aaron_spam@...>
> That's the point... kind of. Verant has always said from the
> beginning that they do not want trade skills to be profitable when
> you sell your wares back to the NPC vendors.
>
> --
> Aaron Braunstein
> Pacific Data Management, Inc.

Yes, but who else is going to buy most of that 'junk'?? I mean really, how
many of you would PAY to have a rusty weapon sharpened for you? DUH! They
should at least make them BREAK EVEN - No money made, but no money LOST
either (when successful anyway) while you are practicing your 'skill'.

And if Verant doesn't want to do a proper money economy (now money is
constantly added to the game) then I would also like to see prices for the
components go DOWN as your skill level increases! Make it profitable at
SOME point in your skill level!

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com
